4942.quoteText: Last modified on August 6, 2018 and effective on August 6, 2018.
4942.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms

tosdr.case: There is a date of the last update of the terms

5261.quoteText: In addition to cookies, we may also use other similar tracking technologies on our services.
5261.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.
tosdr.tldr: The Cookie Policy states that they use Web Beacons (also called "tracking pixels", "internet tags", "pixel tags" or "clear gifs"), Embedded Scripts, Device Fingerprinting, and Local Storage.

5266.quoteText: We do not respond to "do not track" signals at this time.
5266.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

tosdr.case: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.
